meanings.sent1: He reinjuries his ankle while playing soccer.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to reinjuries yourself while lifting heavy objects.
meanings.sent3: She always reinjuries herself right before an important event!
meanings.sent4: The old wound reinjuries every time he tries to run.
meanings.sent5: The risk of reinjuries is high in contact sports.

meanings.definition: Suffer a new injury to a previously injured body part
meanings.sent1: After the accident, he reinjuries his shoulder during physical therapy.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often reinjuries the same knee multiple times.
meanings.sent3: He managed to reinjuries his ankle just before the big race!
meanings.sent4: The fragile knee easily reinjuries with the slightest misstep.
meanings.sent5: The patient was warned about the possibility of reinjuries during recovery.
